card.name: Angelic Chorus
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Arcane Artisan
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card. When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Archfiend of Despair
card.text: Flying Your opponents can't gain life. At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life that player lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

card.name: Archon of Valor's Reach
card.text: Flying, vigilance, trample As Archon of Valor's Reach enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker. Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.

card.name: Arena Rector
card.text: When Arena Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Auger Spree
card.text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Beast Within
card.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Blaring Captain
card.text: Partner with Blaring Recruiter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Recruiter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever Blaring Captain attacks, attacking Warriors get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blaring Recruiter
card.text: Partner with Blaring Captain (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Captain into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {2}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.text: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Bountiful Promenade
card.text: Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Bramble Sovereign
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.

card.name: Brightling
card.text: {W}: Brightling gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Brightling gains lifelink until end of turn. {W}: Return Brightling to its owner's hand. {1}: Brightling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Centaur Healer
card.text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Chain Lightning
card.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chakram Retriever
card.text: Partner with Chakram Slinger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Slinger into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever you cast a spell during your turn, untap target creature.

card.name: Chakram Slinger
card.text: Partner with Chakram Retriever (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Retriever into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {R}, {T}: Chakram Slinger deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Charging Binox
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.) Trample

card.name: Cheering Fanatic
card.text: Whenever Cheering Fanatic attacks, choose a card name. Spells with the chosen name cost {1} less to cast this turn.

card.name: Daggerdrome Imp
card.text: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Diabolic Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Doomed Dissenter
card.text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Dwarven Lightsmith
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.) When Dwarven Lightsmith enters the battlefield, creatures your team controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Eager Construct
card.text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Expedition Raptor
card.text: Flying When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

card.name: Fan Favorite
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.) {2}: Fan Favorite gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

card.name: Fumble
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Gain control of all Auras and Equipment that were attached to it, then attach them to another creature.

card.name: Game Plan
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.) Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.

card.name: Gang Up
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.) Destroy target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Generous Patron
card.text: When Generous Patron enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.) Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, draw a card.

card.name: Gorm the Great
card.text: Partner with Virtus the Veiled (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Virtus into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Vigilance Gorm the Great must be blocked if able, and Gorm must be blocked by two or more creatures if able.

card.name: Greater Good
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

card.name: Grothama, All-Devouring
card.text: Other creatures have "Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it fight Grothama, All-Devouring." When Grothama leaves the battlefield, each player draws cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to Grothama this turn by sources they controlled.

card.name: Huddle Up
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.) Two target players each draw a card.

card.name: Impetuous Protege
card.text: Partner with Proud Mentor (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Proud Mentor into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever Impetuous Protege attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among tapped creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Impulse
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Inner Demon
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types. When Inner Demon enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Jubilant Mascot
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

card.name: Jungle Wayfinder
card.text: When Jungle Wayfinder enters the battlefield, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Khorvath Brightflame
card.text: Partner with Sylvia Brightspear (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Sylvia into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying, haste Knights your team controls have flying and haste.

card.name: Khorvath's Fury
card.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend discards all cards from their hand, then draws that many cards plus one. Khorvath's Fury deals damage to each foe equal to the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Kor Spiritdancer
card.text: Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Krav, the Unredeemed
card.text: Partner with Regna, the Redeemer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Regna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {B}, Sacrifice X creatures: Target player draws X cards and gains X life. Put X +1/+1 counters on Krav, the Unredeemed.

card.name: Land Tax
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Last One Standing
card.text: Choose a creature at random, then destroy the rest.

card.name: Lava-Field Overlord
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.) Flying When Lava-Field Overlord enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Ley Weaver
card.text: Partner with Lore Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Lore Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {T}: Untap two target lands.

card.name: Lore Weaver
card.text: Partner with Ley Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Ley Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {5}{U}{U}: Target player draws two cards.

card.name: Luxury Suite
card.text: Luxury Suite enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Magus of the Candelabra
card.text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.

card.name: Mindblade Render
card.text: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Morphic Pool
card.text: Morphic Pool enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Nirkana Revenant
card.text: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}. {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Okaun, Eye of Chaos
card.text: Partner with Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Zndrsplt into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Whenever a player wins a coin flip, double Okaun's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Out of Bounds
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Peregrine Drake
card.text: Flying When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

card.name: Pir, Imaginative Rascal
card.text: Partner with Toothy, Imaginary Friend (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Toothy into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) If one or more counters would be put on a permanent your team controls, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.

card.name: Pir's Whim
card.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend searches their library for a land card, puts it on the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library. Each foe sacrifices an artifact or enchantment they control.

card.name: Play of the Game
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.) Exile all nonland permanents.

card.name: Proud Mentor
card.text: Partner with Impetuous Protege (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Impetuous Protege into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Regna's Sanction
card.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control. Each foe chooses one untapped creature they control, then taps the rest.

card.name: Regna, the Redeemer
card.text: Partner with Krav, the Unredeemed (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Krav into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying At the beginning of each end step, if your team gained life this turn, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

card.name: Rowan Kenrith
card.text: +2: During target player's next turn, each creature that player controls attacks if able. -2: Rowan Kenrith deals 3 damage to each tapped creature target player controls. -8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy." Partner with Will Kenrith Rowan Kenrith can be your commander.

card.name: Rushblade Commander
card.text: Warriors your team controls have haste.

card.name: Saltwater Stalwart
card.text: Whenever Saltwater Stalwart deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.

card.name: Sea of Clouds
card.text: Sea of Clouds enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Seedborn Muse
card.text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Sentinel Tower
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell is cast during your turn, Sentinel Tower deals 1 damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of instant and sorcery spells cast before that spell this turn.

card.name: Shoulder to Shoulder
card.text: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Draw a card.

card.name: Sickle Dancer
card.text: Whenever Sickle Dancer attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Sickle Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Skyshroud Claim
card.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Skystreamer
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {4} of this spell's cost.) Flying When Skystreamer enters the battlefield, target player gains 4 life.

card.name: Soaring Show-Off
card.text: Flying When Soaring Show-Off enters the battlefield, each player draws a card.

card.name: Soulblade Corrupter
card.text: Partner with Soulblade Renewer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Renewer into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Deathtouch Whenever a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks one of your opponents, that creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Soulblade Renewer
card.text: Partner with Soulblade Corrupter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Corrupter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) When Soulblade Renewer enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

card.name: Sower of Temptation
card.text: Flying When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Spellseeker
card.text: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Spell Snare
card.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.

card.name: Spire Garden
card.text: Spire Garden enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Stadium Vendors
card.text: When Stadium Vendors enters the battlefield, choose a player. That player adds two mana of any one color they choose.

card.name: Stolen Strategy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

card.name: Stunning Reversal
card.text: The next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw seven cards and your life total becomes 1. Exile Stunning Reversal.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Sylvia Brightspear
card.text: Partner with Khorvath Brightflame (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Khorvath into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Double strike Dragons your team controls have double strike.

card.name: The Crowd Goes Wild
card.text: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.) Support X. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.) Each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Thrasher Brute
card.text: Whenever Thrasher Brute or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tidespout Tyrant
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Together Forever
card.text: When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.) {1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Toothy, Imaginary Friend
card.text: Partner with Pir, Imaginative Rascal (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Pir into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Toothy, Imaginary Friend. When Toothy leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: True-Name Nemesis
card.text: As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player. (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

card.name: Veteran Explorer
card.text: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Victory Chimes
card.text: Untap Victory Chimes during each other player's untap step. {T}: A player of your choice adds {C}.

card.name: Vigor
card.text: Trample If damage would be dealt to a creature you control other than Vigor, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Virtus's Maneuver
card.text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand. Each foe sacrifices a creature they control.

card.name: Virtus the Veiled
card.text: Partner with Gorm the Great (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Gorm into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Deathtouch Whenever Virtus the Veiled deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

card.name: Will Kenrith
card.text: +2: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities. -2: Target player draws two cards. Until your next turn, instant, sorcery, and planeswalker spells that player casts cost {2} less to cast. -8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy." Partner with Rowan Kenrith Will Kenrith can be your commander.

card.name: Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom
card.text: Partner with Okaun, Eye of Chaos (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Okaun into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Whenever a player wins a coin flip, draw a card.
